NK009(ta)004:0: mtsho rgyal snyan brgyud phur pa'i brgyud 'debs bzhugs /
NK009(ta)004:1: kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka /
NK009(ta)004:2: rdo rje chos dang mkha' 'gro las kyi dbang //
NK009(ta)004:3: pra b+ha ha sti bde ba'i 'khor lo ma //
NK009(ta)004:4: pad+ma 'byung gnas pan chen bi ma la //
NK009(ta)004:5: sh+ai la many+dzu ye shes mtsho rgyal dang //
NK009(ta)004:6: a tsar sa le pad+ma las 'brel rtsal //
NK009(ta)004:7: brgyud gsum rig 'dzin rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK009(ta)004:8: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su //
NK009(ta)004:9: rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum sras dang bcas //
NK009(ta)004:10: dam can ma mo ging dang lcam dral la //
NK009(ta)004:11: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
NK009(ta)004:12: bskyed pa'i rim pas snang srid lha skur dag /
NK009(ta)004:13: rdzogs rim rtsa rlung sems la dbang thob pas //
NK009(ta)004:14: bde chen dga' bzhi'i ye shes mthar phyin nas //
NK009(ta)004:15: zung 'jug sku bzhi'o go 'phang thob par shog /
